entry.title: Proposed release schedule 0.13.0
entry.summary: In an email on March 14, 2016, Wladimir J. van der Laan proposed a release schedule for version 0.13.0 of Bitcoin. The release dates were mistakenly listed as May 1 and May 15, 2015 instead of 2016. A more active tracking of the project's progress can be found on the Bitcoin GitHub page, specifically the issue tracker and milestone section for version 0.13.0.
